data.title: A whole night of poetry? Yes - we need it! See you Sunday, June 2, 7:00 pm (6:30pm doors) J. M. Abraham Atlantic Poetry Reading: Live at...
data.meta_description:
38 likes, 0 comments - atlanticbookawards on May 27, 2024: "A whole night of poetry? Yes - we need it! See you Sunday, June 2, 7:00 pm (6:30pm doors) 

J. M. Abraham Atlantic Poetry Reading: Live at The Carleton
Hosted by: Sue Goyette 
The Carleton, 1685 Argyle St
$10

Don’t miss the chance to meet the J. M. Abraham Atlantic Poetry Award nominees. Poets will be reading from their nominated books! Bookmark will sell the nominated titles, and authors will be available for book signings. 

Featuring: 
Joe Bishop, Indie Rock, University of Alberta Press
Matthew Hollett, Optic Nerve, Brick Books
Sadie McCarney, Your Therapist Says It’s Magical Thinking, ECW Press
Fawn Parker, Soft Inheritance, Palimpsest Press
Harry Thurston, Ultramarine, Gaspereau Press

Bookmark will be selling the nominated titles, and authors will be available for book signings. Ticket link in bio".
